contacts.title: WANT TO CONTACT US?
contacts.workTime: We work by appointment from Monday to Saturday

wellness_procedures_desc: Having been in the SPA and wellness industry for more than 15 years, we have formed a circle of our favorite specialists in different areas. It is an honor to give you the opportunity to meet them in our studio in Berga Bazārs.

partnership.title: BECOME A PARTNER
partnership.description: Doesn't matter whether you represent a SPA complex or have personal practice, if you want to work with [ comfort zone ] and/or /skin regimen/, we will help you with this and, perhaps, will become your best partner!
